p: The one-way ANOVA test showed a significant reduction in the expression of mexE and mexY genes in the presence of SKEO for all isolates (P<0.001). The Livak method also revealed that different concentrations of SKEO significantly reduced mexE expression (9.7-fold) and mexY (4.99-fold) compared with the control gene. As shown in table 3, pairwise comparisons of the groups using the post hoc Tukey HSD test showed that the efficacy of SKEO on the gene expression of mexE was about two times more than the mexY gene. Moreover, the expression of mexE gene was 2.18-fold greater than mexY gene before treatment.
